transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello. 
Executive: Hello, Aditya ji se baat ho rahi hai Krishna Traders mein?
Customer: Haan bolo.
Executive: Aditya ji namaskar, main Priyanka baat kar rahi hu sir IndiaMART ki team se, recorded line pe sir. 
Haan. 
Executive: Do minute baat karni thi bas aapke saath, zyada waqt nahi lungi. 
Executive: Aapka ek feedback hamein receive hua tha sir, aapke account manager hai Manisha ji. 
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Unki aapse baat hui hogi, bas aapne conversation ko mark kiya tha ki aap usse santusht nahi hai. 
Customer: Kispe?
Executive: Bas aapke samajhna tha jo bhi baat cheet hui sir. 
Executive: IndiaMART se jo baat cheet hui aapki, aapne WhatsApp pe udhar feedback diya hai ki aap usse santusht nahi hai. 
Executive: Bas call isliye kiya hai sir, aap agar bata paaye ki kya cheez hum improve kar sakte hai, hum aapko theek karwa ke denge sir.
Customer: Maine toh aisa kuch kiya nahi tha.

Customer: Ya galti se hua aayega shayad se, mereko idea nahi hai.
Customer: Mera toh baat, mera toh baat hota hi hai Manisha mam se.
Executive: Haan Manisha ji se baat cheet hoti rehti hai, woh aapka account dekhti hai, toh unhi ke liye feedback hamein receive hua hai isliye main call kar rahi hu. 
Executive: Samajhne ke liye ki Manisha se agar koi galti ho gayi hai sir, toh aap samajh, ya humari taraf se kuch chahe toh aap batao. 
Customer: Nahi nahi.
Customer: IndiaMART ka taraf se kuch, mera usse kuch galti hua hi nahi hai kuch.
Executive: Nahi nahi aapse nahi sir, main yeh keh rahi hu kuch humari taraf se shayad pending reh gaya hai, koi catalog ka kaam hai, aap batao sir theek karwayenge bas. 
Executive: Isliye call kiya Manisha ki manager baat kar rahi hu sir main.
Customer: Mereko abhi tak, mera catalog abhi tak mera jo hai barabar hi hai sir.
Executive: Achha toh jaise catalog mein kuch cheezein abhi aapko call karne se pehle na, main check kar rahi thi sir, humare paas kaafi saare aise woh hai jaise aapka ek trimming belt hai. 
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Fan V belt. 
Customer: Fan mera nahi hai.
Executive: Isme aap leads le rahe ho sir, 27 leads li hai aapne haal filhaal mein, Fan V belt. 
Customer: Fan mera nahi hai.
Executive: Trimming belts?
Customer: Woh bhi nahi, fix bhi nahi hai.
Executive: Open end trimming belts, fix V belts. 
Customer: Nahi nahi woh sab nahi hai.
Executive: Fan belts. 
Customer: Fan belt hai bas.
Executive: Fan belt added nahi hai isme, 55 leads li gayi hai, yeh jitne naam maine liye na sir, cheh naam, yeh woh hai products jinki by leads aap le rahe ho lekin woh na humare isme catalog mein dhale nahi hue.
Customer: Haan main dusre se purchase karke de raha hu aisa hoyega.
Executive: Sir trading bhi kar rahe hai?
Customer: Matlab mera, mera sirf micro hai, baaki Manisha mam ko malum hai sab, faner woh fix dusra brand hai us, main usse nahi karta hu.
Executive: Toh yeh aisa hota hai sir, jaise catalog mein dhale nahi hue, by leads toh search karke le lenge aapko dikh jayengi. 
Executive: Lekin jo inquiry aur call hoti hai na, woh aapko nahi mil paati hai. 
Executive: Toh inme se koi bhi product agar aisa hai aap bolo ki mere catalog mein daal do, taaki woh dikh jaaye buyer ko aur woh aapko call aur inquiry. 
Customer: Are woh log fir, woh log fir fix ka hi material maangenge, fix ka main chalata nahi hu udhar.
Executive: Achha.
Executive: Toh abhi jo aapke catalog mein dala hua hai na sir woh is rubber V belt hai. 
Executive: Automotive V belt hai, rubber timing belt hai, PU timing belt hai aur cogged V belt hai, yeh paanch hai bas. 
Customer: Barabar.
Executive: Aur poly V belt hai, PU conveyor belt, flat belt aur raw edge V belt, yeh hai. 
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Toh yeh sab sahi dala hua hai sir?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Inme kuch addition ki koi type of products ho, alag alag kuch variety ho. 
Customer: Ola bike, ek Ola bike ka bhi hoyega.
Executive: Haan Ola bike aapke rubber trimming belt mein dali hui hai. 
Executive: Ola bike toh lekin alag cheez hai na usko alag daal du?
Customer: Ola activa ka hai woh.
Executive: Haan. 
Executive: Aise hi rehne du sir kya karu ispe batao?
Customer: Alag se woh daal do sab.
Executive: Alag daal deti hu na kyunki yeh alag cheez hai, ek second ruko. 


Executive: Humara Ola bike, iska price kya rakhna hai sir?
Customer: 1200.
Executive: 1200?
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Company wale toh paanch paanch hazaar mein de rahe, chaar chaar hazaar, paanch paanch hazaar.
Executive: Achha.

Customer: Yeh jo hai sir, yeh Ola, milega toh ₹1000.
Customer: Ola bike belt hai yeh?
Customer: Ola activa ka hai woh belt hai.
Executive: Uska belt hai na?
Customer: Haan, abhi jaisa Ola activa chalti hai na, charging wali. 
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Sab jagah. 
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Toh koi koi customer ko belt lagti hai, toh hum log banate hai. 
Customer: Aur jo company fitting deta hai woh chaar chaar hazaar, paanch paanch hazaar ka company fitting deta hai. 
Customer: Toh hum log ek piece ₹1200 ka deta hai, dete hai aur 50 500 piece ₹1000.

Executive: Yeh driving belt hoti hai, fan belt ya timing belt sir? 
Executive: Yeh kis prakar ki hoti hai?
Customer: V belt, industrial mein jo looms mein lagta hai.
Executive: Isko automotive belt kaha jata hai sir. 
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Automotive AX AX 1300 woh sab hai, photo mein hai na usme. 
Executive: Haan haan. 
Customer: Aur aur automobile ka.

Executive: Iska koi specific color hota hai sir?
Customer: Black hi hai color kuch nahi hai usme.
Executive: Black. 
Executive: Kis material ka bana hota hai sir yeh?
Customer: Rubber coated rehta hai rubber.
Executive: Rubber coated hota hai okay. 
Haan.

Executive: Aur iska kuch length hota hai sir? 
Executive: Kitne length ka hota hai yeh?
Customer: Woh alag alag yeh hai.
Executive: Customized ho jata hai matlab user ke hisab se. 
Customer: Haan.


Executive: Sir isko yeh alag se add kar diya sir maine.

Executive: Aap ek baar na aisa karna sir, jaise aapka application hai na. 
Executive: Apne application mein ek baar apne products bhi dekh lena, koi cheez chhooti hui toh bata dena. 
Executive: Sir theek kara denge, kuch products. 
Customer: Mereko Mumbai wale jo hai, humko kya pagal banate hai kya? 
Haan?
Executive: Kya hua sir aap batao sir, maafi chahungi. 
Customer: Jo mereko IndiaMART mereko leke diya hai, woh usne khali paisa leke sab chala gaya, na phone uthata tha na kuch karta hai, aise hi manager bana ke rakha hai Mumbai mein usko. 
Customer: Phone kar raha hu toh phone bhi nahi uthata hai.
Executive: Nahi phone nahi uthana galat hai sir, baaki servicing ke liye na saare hi bhi account Noida mein rehte hai. 
Executive: Isliye shayad Manisha. 
Customer: Service center Noida mein malum hai mujhe lekin jo Mumbai mein teen chaar jan mereko roz pareshan karte the IndiaMART mein account kholo, IndiaMART mein account kholo, abhi woh log dikhte bhi nahi hai, aate hi nahi hai Diventi mein. 

Executive: Bombay mein Bombay mein hi baithe hue the. 
Executive: Unka yeh rehta hai na, unka yeh rehta hai na, kaagaz collect karke, document collect karke onboard toh kar dete hai, but uske aage ka sara zimmedari Noida mein hi rehti hai. 
Executive: Shayad is wajah se baat cheet aapki nahi ho pa rahi but yeh galat hai. 
Customer: Noida se aap aaoge kya mujhe baat batao ek baar, Mumbai mein problem solve karne ke liye.
Executive: Sir yeh thoda Noida se aana mushkil hai aur koi cheez aisi hai nahi jo phone pe discuss ya video call pe discuss hoke theek nahi ho sakti. 
Executive: Agar koi dikkat aayegi aapke catalog mein kuch bhi rahega hum available hai aap batao, bilkul video call par aapko batayenge sir kaunsi cheez kaise theek karni hai. 
Executive: Kuch agar hai toh aap please share karo sir, sara correct karke denge aapko lagega nahi aisa ki zarurat thi samne ki.
Customer: Saturday ko Manisha mam ko bolo video connect karne ke liye.
Executive: Haan bilkul karwa deti hu sir, kya time rakhu aap batao?
Customer: Dupehar mein.
Executive: 1 baje ka rakh du sir ya 2-3 baje ka rakhu? 
Customer: 1 baje.
Executive: 1 baje Manisha ji aapko connect karengi Saturday ko. 
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai agar rahega toh kuch bhi rahega aap samne samne na unse correct bhi karwa lena. 
Executive: Woh apna screen aapko dikha dengi aap jo jo jaisa jaisa bologe na woh on spot aapko theek kar dengi.
Customer: Woh itna bulk mein order nahi aa raha hai, mereko single single piece ka hi order aa raha hai, woh mereko. 
Executive: Sir woh bhi sabhi sara ek baar sara dikhayenge ki kis tarike se usko apply karte hai. 
Executive: Aur kaha se woh orders check karte hai. 
Executive: Sara aapko woh dikha denge. 
Customer: Order check karna malum hai mam, lekin abhi mereko woh log customer ko udhar likha rehta hai 50 piece chahiye, udhar main call karta hu toh bolte hai do hi piece chahiye, ek piece chahiye, kya fayda mere call karne ka?
Executive: Sir aise koi buyers rehte hai na sir jo consume karne se pehle aapko waha par mention jo quantity hai woh alag hai. 
Executive: Baat karne ke baad woh alag bolte hai toh aap please woh hamein highlight karo. 
Executive: Humari team us par ek baar reconnect karke confirm karegi sir. 
Executive: Hum aapko usme help karenge.
Customer: Aur mereko bahar ka order chahiye hi nahi, mereko sirf Mumbai ka hi chahiye, bahar mera paisa. 
Executive: Koi nahi bahar se settings mein jaake hatani padengi sir, not relevant mark karni hoti hai waha pe jaake add kar dena. 
Customer: Bahar se paisa mera fasta hai, mereko udhar se karne ka nahi hai.
Executive: Nahi agar aise mein bhi aapko rahe na kabhi kisi se deal karni hai sir, aap humse bhi thoda discuss kar sakte ho ki yeh jo hai aapke buyer yeh IndiaMART pe registered hai ki nahi hai. 
Executive: Hum yeh toh confirm kar hi denge sir. 
Executive: Agar woh IndiaMART pe registered client hai toh usse paisa fasne ki koi problem nahi rahegi sir. 
Executive: Kyunki hum khud involve ho gaye na usme. 
Customer: Bahut achha main rate du barabar se aur fir woh log do do mahine ke baad payment denge aisa nahi chalta hai mam.
Executive: Credit pe lene ki baat karte hai. 
Customer: Main deuga 60 60% discount aur bolta hu main payment mereko advance chahiye ya kuch do teen din ke baad dete hai fir bolte hai ki ek mahine ke baad ya do mahine ke baad payment aata hai unka, bahar bahar wali party.
Executive: Nahi aap advance mein rakh sakte ho sir, yeh toh aapka call hai, zaruri nahi hai aapko credit pe dena hai, aap apni full deal advance mein bana sakte ho.
Customer: Iske liye main bol raha hu Mumbai ka main Mumbai ka Mumbai mein hoyega customer main khud jaake payment collect kar sakta hu, aisa hai.
Executive: Okay. 
Executive: Okay sir aisa karte hai fir ek baar na us call pe main bhi reh lungi. 
Executive: Jo bhi isme challenges aa rahe honge, jo issue aa rahe honge na, ek baar samne se main aapko ek dikha ke thoda bata dungi kaise solve kiye ja sakte hai.
Customer: Theek hai main call back karta hu baad mein, Saturday ko mam ko bolna video call karne.
Executive: Haan main saath reh lungi, baaki yeh jo humare paas ek yeh concern raise hua tha sir, ki aap Manisha ji ki call se santusht nahi hai, woh concern main close kar du?
Customer: Maine kuch mere se galti se hua aayega, aisa mera kuch woh nahi tha ki unko hurt karne ke liye, mera baat cheet ho gaya barabar hai.
Executive: Koi baat nahi sir, aisa kuch nahi hai sir, aisa kuch nahi hai. 
Executive: Woh WhatsApp pe bas ek feedback jata hai, ho sakta hai galti se press ho gaya ho. 
Executive: Bas main aapse yeh permission maang rahi thi ki main yaha se apne end se ab use band kar du. 
Customer: Satisfy kar do usko, maine shayad se non satisfy kiya hoyega.
Executive: Okay sir koi baat nahi aap abhi main isko nullify karungi abhi aapke paas dobara option aayega sir. 
Executive: Satisfied not satisfied, jab aap satisfied press karo woh waise hi null ho jayega sir aur aapki taraf se agar aap satisfied ho IndiaMART se Manisha ji ki services se toh bilkul aap us par satisfied press karna sir.
Executive: Theek hai sir?
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received single piece orders only. 

- Customer's money gets stuck with outside buyers.

- Mumbai team not providing support after onboarding.

- Customer marked conversation as unsatisfied by mistake.



Resolution:

- Executive will join the call on Saturday.

- Executive offered to check buyer registration status.

- Executive offered to help with settings.

- Executive will close the concern.



Next Steps: 

- Manisha will connect with customer on Saturday 1PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, orders, mumbai, payment, support
